actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to appear as amicus curiae in the name of the Senate in American Foreign Service Association, et al. v. Steven Garfinkel, et al.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to appear as amicus curiae in the name of the Senate in American Foreign Service Association, et al. v. Steven Garfinkel, et al.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to appear as amicus curiae in the name of the Senate in American Foreign Service Association, et al. v. Steven Garfinkel, et al.
